channel.title: Curated Updates
channel.description: This feed allows users to get updates on the Curated News service, including, but not limited to, information about news source designations and application updates and changes. It has been created for Curated News users but has been posted publicly only for transparency purposes.

item.title: Update: Curated Regions🗺️ Added to Website Platform
item.description: This provides consumers all local news outlets as a Database across the United States.

item.title: Update: Curated News Database🗄 Added to Android
item.description: This gives users the ability to query our database offline and privately.

item.title: Update: Curated Analytics Dashboard📊 Added to Website Platform
item.description: This allows you to conduct analysis on our recently released Curated News Dataset.

item.title: Update: Curated News (Free)🆓 Added to Android
item.description: This gives users a free version of Curated News as a headlines reader.

item.title: Update: Curated Headlines🆕 Added to Website Platform
item.description: This allows you to get Curated News based on a headlines methodology from your desktop.

item.title: Update: News Timer⏱️ Widget Added to Android Platform
item.description: This allows you to set time limits on your news consumption.

item.title: Update: Analytics📊 Section Added to Android Platform
item.description: This allows you to analyze your news consumption habits.

item.title: Update: Outrage😡 Evaluator Added to Android Platform
item.description: This allows you to perform sentiment analysis on news articles.

item.title: First Update: Curated Updates📨 Added to Android Platform
item.description: This allows you to see current and past information (today+) about the platform.
